Top Ten




  • Number 1: The Shout

    The Hottest movie of 2014, The shout! it combines comedy with horror and horror with tradegy. Its a must see and we reccomend it for all. (warning do not bring small children as they are hazardous)

  • Number 2: Domesticated Child

    Domesticated Child is the perfect movie for all ages although under 12s are not permitted.
  • Number 3: Sit down 5

    Kirk Douglas and Maggie Smith star in an elderly hip hopping jaw dropping dance show full of popping and locking they meet other people who stereotypically dont dance on their journey to stardom will they make it?.
